titleStmt.title: A petition against the East-India Company To the Honourable the Commons of England in Parliament assembled. The humble petition of several merchants and traders, in and about the City of London, and other Their Majesties subjects.

publicationStmt.publisher: printed by Thomas Braddyll and Robert Everingham, and are to be sold at the Seven Stars in Ave-Mary-Lane,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the Harvard University Library.
